briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy of Sage-217 in the Treatment of Adult Participants With Major Depressive Disorder (MDD)
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multicenter, Double-Blind, Randomized, Placebo-Controlled Study Evaluating the Efficacy of SAGE-217 in the Treatment of Adult Subjects With Major Depressive Disorder
summary: The purpose of this study to evaluate the efficacy of SAGE-217 in the treatment of participants with MDD.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in the 17-item HAM-D Total Score at Day 15
